meanings.definition: The act of transmitting television programs via cable.
meanings.sent1: Cablecasting allows us to watch TV shows through cables.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy watching cablecasting of sports events on TV.
meanings.sent3: The cablecasting of the cooking show made me hungry!
meanings.sent4: Her voice was like a soothing cablecasting of calmness into the room.
meanings.sent5: The vivid colors in the cablecasting made the show come alive.

meanings.definition: A television program that is transmitted via cable.
meanings.sent1: Last night's cablecasting was a thrilling detective series.
meanings.sent2: I prefer cablecasting over regular network TV shows.
meanings.sent3: The cablecasting about penguins was both cute and informative.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room like a joyful cablecasting.
meanings.sent5: The cablecasting of the concert made me feel like I was there.
